data.name: BLOWFLY
data.detailed_description:
This is an NES style 2D platform game, the protagonist BlowFly needs to fly and explore to find the pink poo in the map and destroy them, which is the only condition to pass the level. On the way of the adventure, you need to avoid dangerous traps, defeat the alien creature AssMan that invades the earth, destroy the enemy's raw material center, and achieve the final victory!

As a member of superheroes, BlowFly has a strong body and unique flying ability. AssMan, the invader of the earth, collected a large amount of [shit] as the raw material for developing destructive weapons. Due to BlowFly's keen sense of [shit], the task of destroying the enemy's raw material center fell on his shoulders.

In this game you will:
1. Facing a large number of precise platform challenges.
2. Against the mentally handicapped but one-shot deadly enemies.
3. The faster the customs clearance, the higher the score.
4. Challenge powerful BOSS.
5. Complete the dream of saving the world.

However, please purchase this game with caution if you:
1. The game mechanism without SAVE/LOAD in the middle cannot be accepted
2. You can't take pleasure in the victory that comes with precise manipulation
3. The game screen of the NES era cannot be accepted
4. Can't accept harsh chip music

data.short_description: This is an NES style platformer game, fly and explore to find pink poo in the map and destroy them, which is the only condition to pass the level. You need to avoid dangerous traps, defeat the alien creature AssMan that invades the earth, and achieve the final victory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Core2
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 HD 7850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: --
  • Additional Notes: --
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1650
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Sound Card: --
  • Additional Notes: --
